hero.title: Transform Testing with
hero.subtitle: Empower teachers to create intelligent assessments and provide students with personalized feedback and AI-powered study assistance.

features.title: Complete Assessment Solution
features.subtitle: From test creation to personalized feedback, our platform handles the entire educational assessment workflow.

aiTestGeneration.title: AI Test Generation
aiTestGeneration.description: Create comprehensive tests instantly with our advanced AI that understands your curriculum and learning objectives.

automatedGrading.title: Automated Grading
automatedGrading.description: Save hours with intelligent evaluation that provides detailed feedback and identifies learning gaps automatically.

studentInsights.title: Student Insights
studentInsights.description: Track student progress with detailed analytics and provide personalized learning recommendations.

personalAiTutor.title: Personal AI Tutor
personalAiTutor.description: Get instant explanations and study guidance tailored to your specific learning needs and mistakes.

interactiveResults.title: Interactive Results
interactiveResults.description: Access your test results through a personalized link with detailed explanations and improvement suggestions.

studyMaterials.title: Study Materials
studyMaterials.description: Receive curated study materials and practice questions based on your performance and learning goals.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple, powerful workflow that transforms traditional testing into an intelligent learning experience.

generateTest.title: Generate Test
generateTest.description: Teachers use AI to create customized tests based on their curriculum and learning objectives.

printDistribute.title: Print & Distribute
printDistribute.description: Print the generated test and distribute to students for traditional paper-based assessment.

aiEvaluation.title: AI Evaluation
aiEvaluation.description: Our AI evaluates completed tests and generates detailed feedback and explanations.

personalizedLearning.title: Personalized Learning
personalizedLearning.description: Students receive personalized links with results, explanations, and AI tutoring support.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Classroom?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of educators who are already using AI to create better learning experiences for their students.

newsletter.title: Stay Updated
